heading: HR00100
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ALL PUBLIC TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMPANIES ON THE NUMEROUS COMPLAINTS OF MANY SUBSCRIBERS ON MASSIVE LOSS OF PRE-PAID LOADS EVEN BEFORE THEY CONSUME THEM
